# Simple Lead Gen Form

A Simple Lead Gen Form Plugin for WordPress

**Contributors:** [sofyan sitorus](https://profiles.wordpress.org/sofyan sitorus)<br>
**Tags:** [lead-form](https://wordpress.org/plugins/tags/lead-form)<br>
**Requires at least:** 4.4<br>
**Tested up to:** 4.9.4<br>
**Stable tag:** trunk (master)<br>
**License:** [GPLv2](http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-2.0.html)<br>
**Requires PHP:** 5.6<br>

## Description ##

A Simple Lead Gen Form Plugin for WordPress

## Installation ##

1. Upload the entire `/slgf` directory to the `/wp-content/plugins/` directory.
2. Activate Simple Lead Gen Form through the \'Plugins\' menu in WordPress.
